mail.title: Sartthi Mail
mail.welcomeDesc: Your secure email platform integrated with Google Mail
mail.welcomeContent: Sartthi Mail provides a seamless email experience with powerful features for managing your inbox, composing messages, and staying organized.
mail.accessDockContent: Click the Mail icon in the Dock (sidebar) anytime to quickly open Sartthi Mail in a new tab.
mail.accessHomeContent: Navigate to the Home page and click "Open App" in the Sartthi Mail card to launch the application.
mail.keyFeaturesContent: Manage your inbox, compose emails, organize with folders, search messages, and sync with your Google Mail account.
mail.allSetContent: Your account is connected and ready to use. Click "Get Started" to open Sartthi Mail and begin managing your emails.

calendar.title: Sartthi Calendar
calendar.welcomeContent: Sartthi Calendar helps you organize events, set reminders, and stay on top of your schedule with Google Calendar integration.
calendar.accessDockContent: Click the Calendar icon in the Dock (sidebar) anytime to quickly open Sartthi Calendar in a new tab.
calendar.accessHomeContent: Navigate to the Home page and click "Open App" in the Sartthi Calendar card to launch the application.
calendar.keyFeaturesContent: Create events, set reminders, share calendars, view multiple calendar views, and sync with your Google Calendar.
calendar.allSetContent: Your account is connected and ready to use. Click "Get Started" to open Sartthi Calendar and begin managing your schedule.

vault.title: Sartthi Vault
vault.welcomeDesc: Secure file storage powered by Google Drive
vault.welcomeContent: Sartthi Vault provides secure cloud storage for all your files with seamless Google Drive integration.
vault.accessDockContent: Click the Vault icon in the Dock (sidebar) anytime to quickly open Sartthi Vault in a new tab.
vault.accessHomeContent: Navigate to the Home page and click "Open App" in the Sartthi Vault card to launch the application.
vault.keyFeaturesContent: Upload files, organize folders, share documents, search your storage, and sync with your Google Drive.
vault.allSetContent: Your account is connected and ready to use. Click "Get Started" to open Sartthi Vault and begin managing your files.

about.title: About Sartthi
about.subtitle: We're building the future of project management, one feature at a time.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Sartthi, we believe that great projects start with great tools. Our mission is to simplify project management and make it accessible to teams of all sizes. We're committed to providing intuitive, powerful, and reliable solutions that help teams collaborate effectively and achieve their goals.

items.scalable: Scalable solutions for teams of any size

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Sartthi is built by a passionate team of developers, designers, and project management experts who understand the challenges of modern team collaboration. We're constantly working to improve our platform and add new features based on user feedback.

address.label: Address:
address.line2: Near Reliance Petrol Pump, Surya Nagar

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get the most out of Sartthi.

analytics.description: Track project progress with built-in analytics and reporting tools.

status.description: Update task status: Todo, In Progress, Completed, or On Hold.

dependencies.title: Task Dependencies
dependencies.description: Set up task dependencies to ensure proper workflow order.

inviting.title: Inviting Team Members
inviting.description: Invite team members to your workspace and assign them to projects.

roles.title: Role Management
roles.description: Assign different roles and permissions to team members.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Use comments and mentions to communicate within tasks and projects.

projectAnalytics.title: Project Analytics
projectAnalytics.description: View detailed analytics on project progress, team performance, and time tracking.

customReports.title: Custom Reports
customReports.description: Generate custom reports for stakeholders and team members.

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Export project data in various formats for external analysis.

commonIssues.title: Common Issues
commonIssues.description: Find solutions to common problems and frequently asked questions.

performance.title: Performance Tips

contact.title: Contact Support

security.title: Security-First Architecture
security.description: Role-based access, audit logs, and SSO ready.

affiliate.title: Affiliate & Coupon Engine
